column1: Pingyin County (simplified Chinese: 平阴县; traditional Chinese: 平陰縣; pinyin: Píngyīn Xiàn) is under the administration of Jinan
column3: People's Republic of China.  The ancient Kingdom of Jibei was located to the northeast of present-day Pingyin County.
